content:
## n8n@0.215.4 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.215.3...n8n@0.215.4) for this version.
**Release date:** 2023-03-14 This is a bug fix release. It reverts the `isPending` check on the user entity, resolving an issue with displaying user options when user management is disabled. --8<-- "_snippets/update-n8n.md"
